Keywords: The Five , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Hope Summers
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: EGG, GOLDBALLS, ELIXIR, PROTEUS, TEMPUS: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, the first time Hope Summers or any of the listed friendly characters would be KO'd, instead turn them to their last non-KO click, then roll a d6 and heal them equal to half the result. Protected: Pulse Wave. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Hope Summers is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Hope Summers attacks only characters with the Robot or Sentinel keywords, she modifies attack and damage +1 and deals penetrating damage. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
THE FIVE: HOPE SUMMERS: When another friendly character is chosen for the Krakoan Revival trait, after resolutions choose a standard power that character can use. Hope Summers can use that power this game.
PSYCHIC POWER DUPLICATION: FREE: Choose up to 3 standard powers that adjacent friendly characters with the X-Men keyword can use. Hope Summers can use those powers until your next turn.
